agent_processes.name: Order Processing Agent
agent_processes.description: Handles the processing of customer orders from receipt to fulfillment.

agent_processes.name: Direct Reply
agent_processes.description: Responds directly back to the user with the provided prompt, without any additional actions by agents.

agent_processes.name: Work Queue Agent
agent_processes.description: Searches the TotalAgility work queue & active jobs using the provided prompt.

agent_processes.name: Optimized Search prompt
agent_processes.description: Uses bing to search the internet.

agent_processes.name: Error or Pass to Human
agent_processes.description: Use this action if the input prompt can't  be understood, if the prompt requests something that is not clear how to resolve, or if the prompt requests something unethical or impossible.
